data.name: Pandaren
data.description:
The Neutral - Pandaren [Q]
Units:
All units except Artillery Units have a 5% chance to deal 1.75x damage
Drunkmaster(Upgrades Abilities)

Buildings:
+10% attack rate

Upgrades:
+1Lv Bamboo Stick
+1Lv Elemental Mix
+1Lv Pandarian Armor

Magic:
Healing Wave (Heals 60 HP for 2 units)
Blessed Lands (Random buff to an ally)
Nature Blast (Deals 150 damage in 200 AoE)

Traits: Strength in beer. All around strong race on all stages of the game. The more pandarens drink, the stronger they get.

Difficulty: Advanced

auras.name: Trade Routes Aura
auras.description:
+30% move speed, x2 income from neutral buildings
(doesn't affect Shrines)
(4500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Endurance Aura
auras.description:
+15% unit attack speed
(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Sharpshooter Aura
auras.description:
+20% building damage and +10% attack rate
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Kesha [R]

Kesha replaces Shui

Pandarian Armor

+1 level of WINE WINE

Reduces spell damage to Mushi, Shui, Brewmaster and Polo by 20% and increases HP by 25. Your units become invisible.

bonuses.name: Source of Magic [C]
bonuses.description:
Icreases Pandarian Sanctuary and Brewmaster mana by 10%. Unlocks upgrades for them inside this building. Reduces cooldowns of defensive Pandarian Sanctuary spells by 30%

Type: Magic Power / Base Defence

bonuses.name: Item Merchant [V]
bonuses.description:
Your heroes will receive a random item for hero kill by them or your units and every 4 level. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell random items to free up inventory slots.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

towerUpgrades.name: Fire Breath
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damaging ability
Affects: Polo

Lv1: 50 damage in 150 AoE
Lv2: 75 damage in 200 AoE
Lv3: 100 damage in 250 AoE
Lv4: 125 damage in 300 AoE

spells.name: Fire Breath 1 lvl
spells.description: A cloud of flames inflicting 50 damage to enemies.

towerUpgrades.name: Drunkmaster
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage
Affects: All Units

Lv0: 5% chance to deal 1.75x damage
Lv1: 10% chance to deal 2x damage
Lv2: 15% chance to deal 2.25x damage
Lv3: 20% chance to deal 2.5x damage
Lv4: 25% chance to deal 2.75x damage

towerUpgrades.name: Magic Shuriken
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bouncing projectyles
Affects: Shui and Elemental Shrine
(20%/55% damage loss per bounce)
(does not affect buildings)

Lv1: can bounce 1 time
Lv2: can bounce 2 times
Lv3: can bounce 3 times
Lv4: can bounce 4 times

towerUpgrades.name: Ying and Yang
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus armor and reduces armor to units
Affects: Polo
(doesn't affect enemy Special unit)
(affects friendly Special unit)

Lv1: +1.5 and -1.5 armor in 500 AoE
Lv2: +3 and -3 armor in 500 AoE
Lv3: +4.5 and -4.5 armor in 500 AoE
Lv4: +6 and -6 armor in 500 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Sharp Eye
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage, range and attack rate
Affects: Owl Rider and Shui

Lv1: +4/8 attack, +25 range, +5% attack rate
Lv2: +8/16 attack, +50 range, +10% attack rate
Lv3: +12/24 attack, +75 range, +15% attack rate
Lv4: +16/32 attack, +100 range, +20% attack rate

towerUpgrades.name: More Beer
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: reduces target's speed in an area
Affects: Brewmaster
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)
(250 area of effect)

Lv1: -6% attack rate, -10% move for 10 sec
Lv2: -12% attack rate, -15% move for 10 sec
Lv3: -18% attack rate, -20% move for 10 sec
Lv4: -24% attack rate, -25% move for 10 sec

spells.name: More Beer 1 lvl
spells.description: Their movement speed is reduced by 15% and attack speed 6%

towerUpgrades.name: Battle Trophies
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: upgrade after a kill
Affects: Mushi and Brewmaster

Lv1: can get Lv1 items
Lv2: can get Lv2 items
Lv3: can get Lv3 items
Lv4: can get Lv4 items

towerUpgrades.name: WINE WINE
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: increases base evasion
Affects: All Units

Lv1: +5% evasion
Lv2: +10% evasion
Lv3: +15% evasion
Lv4: +20% evasion

heroes.name: Earthsong
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Tank

Can learn:
Deafening Roar (Damage Spell)
175-325 damage, 10-22% slow
(250-400 area of effect)
(30 second cooldown)

Pulverize (Passive Skill)
15-27% for 120-240 area damage

Sumo Strength (Passive Skill)
35% to block 10-40 damage

Earth Shield (Self Spell)
2-14 bonus armor
(15 second cooldown)

skills.name: Deafening Roar - [Level 1]
skills.description: Deals 175 damage to nearby enemy land units and slows their movement by 10% and attack rate by 10%.

skills.name: Earth's Shield - [Level 1]
skills.description:
Increases armor by 10.
Lasts 45 seconds.

skills.name: Healing Wave - [Level 4]
skills.description: Heals up to 3 units for 200 hit points.

skills.name: Resurrection - [Level 1]
skills.description: Brings back to life the corpses of 5 friendly nearby units.

skills.name: Frost Nova - [Level 4]
skills.description: Blasts enemy units with a wave of frost that deals <AUfn,DataB4> damage to the target, and <AUfn,DataA4> nova damage. Cold damage slows units' movement and attack rate for <AUfn,Dur4> seconds.
